TopicTitle: [KSP 1.4.5] [x] Science! - KSP Science report and checklist (V5.17)

Articles.Content:
I'm updating now...

I'd have done it earlier but I had 4 job interviews in 5 days this week and I'm still freaking out.

Interviews are not fun.   Hopefully you're getting some good vibes from at least one of them.

(My dad, a long-time personnel director, once observed that in job hunting, if you apply for 1,000 positions and get 999 rejections, it's still a win.   But that doesn't mean it's not rough going through the other 999...)

Investigative journalism going on here ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") hope it includes to lag fix.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-03-17T16:22:58Z" title="03/17/2018 04:22  PM" data-short="6 yr">March 17, 2018</time> by maculator**
  
crazy stuff

Strange Error

I use 1.41 with DLC

Deleted old science folder

checked file integrity with steam

downloaded new version of science 

checked version file: 5.13 for 1.41

when i start kerbal space program module manager says: 5.12 ... there is an update to 5.13... what?

deleted mod

used <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">ckan</abbr> ... same error

Great mod. on of 3 that are must have (kos, kerbal eng, this)

**Edited <time datetime="2018-03-18T16:16:21Z" title="03/18/2018 04:16  PM" data-short="6 yr">March 18, 2018</time> by SchitzoSchaf**

> 
> 
> On 3/16/2018 at 6:29 AM, John007qwe said:
> 
> 
> I've updated my dll version to 1.4 for those who prefer my reduced lag alternative
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [https://www.dropbox.com/s/cad7tc9wvcrx6dp/\[x\] Science!.dll?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cad7tc9wvcrx6dp/%5Bx%5D%20Science%21.dll?dl=0)
> 

Can you update the x science dll to 1.4.1? I do not want lag when I do my experiments, although if you can't that is alright!

**Edited <time datetime="2018-03-18T23:13:25Z" title="03/18/2018 11:13  PM" data-short="6 yr">March 18, 2018</time> by IcyWolfy**

[@SchitzoSchaf](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185318-schitzoschaf/) and [@IcyWolfy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185648-icywolfy/) I use 5.12with the linked lagfix and it works just fine, without lags.

> 
> 
> 13 hours ago, IcyWolfy said:
> 
> 
> Can you update the x science dll to 1.4.1? I do not want lag when I do my experiments, although if you can't that is alright!
> 

It will work for 1.4.1 since there was no change in the code.

The version of x-Science installed by <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> (5.11) works very laggy on my KSP 1.3.1 with <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/<abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/RP-0.

I tried to replace the .dll file from this thread but after that x-science does not work (there're no more its buttons).

[My log file](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tyOgMVPbGenDTeBgfWQj2qqJop5kAigy/view?usp=sharing)

> 
>

> 
>

>

> 
> 
> 
> 
> [My log file](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tyOgMVPbGenDTeBgfWQj2qqJop5kAigy/view?usp=sharing)
> 

yup seems like the updated fix .dll isn't compatible with 1.3.1,

here's a link to the old version [https://transfer.sh/Wy95e/\[x\] Science!.dll](https://transfer.sh/Wy95e/%5Bx%5D%20Science%21.dll)

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, marshmallowking said:
> 
> 
> here's a link to the old version [https://transfer.sh/Wy95e/\[x\] Science!.dll](https://transfer.sh/Wy95e/%5Bx%5D%20Science%21.dll)
> 

Thanks! It works just fine.

am i missing something? i dont see in the help or op or anywhere where the following feature is available in the GUI or cfg:

- No more searching around in service bays - run experiments at the click of a button

> 
> 
> 24 minutes ago, inigma said:
> 
> 
> am i missing something? i dont see in the help or op or anywhere where the following feature is available in the GUI or cfg:
> 
> 
> 
> - No more searching around in service bays - run experiments at the click of a button
> 

There is a button in the stock toolbar. You can turn it off and then right clicking the main button in the toolbar will have the same effect.

I suppose this works on the 1.4.2?

And many thanx to the author ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

**Edited <time datetime="2018-03-28T20:43:46Z" title="03/28/2018 08:43  PM" data-short="6 yr">March 28, 2018</time> by Jungfaha**
  
;p

Thank YOU!

I just tried this mod for the first time today, and I felt compelled to thank the author.

> 
> 
> On 28/3/2018 at 10:43 PM, Jungfaha said:
> 
> 
> I suppose this works on the 1.4.2?
> 

it does

Is there anything that can be done about the experiments that show up as live but are actually "can't do this right now" or something to that effect? For example, hauling regular and universal goo canisters confuses the system. Universal science Jr module always seems available as well, even when you don't have the "normal" version on board.

> 
> 
> 9 hours ago, Warezcrawler said:
> 
> 
> it does
> 

As far I seen it doesn't! I cannot access my custom settings menu when installed with other mods, I have not tried with x science only. I'm currently playing with 1.4.1 because 1.4.2 broke too many things for me.

> 
> 
> 32 minutes ago, LatiMacciato said:
> 
> 
> As far I seen it doesn't! I cannot access my custom settings menu when installed with other mods, I have not tried with x science only. I'm currently playing with 1.4.1 because 1.4.2 broke too many things for me.
> 

I'm playing 1.4.2, and have not noticed any significant issues with x science I did not have in 1.3.1. It's the same version as I used in 1.4.1 and the same experience there. Are you sure you do not have a mod that is conflicting with it? Which version are you  running. Is it the latest 5.13?

**Edited <time datetime="2018-03-31T05:49:47Z" title="03/31/2018 05:49  AM" data-short="6 yr">March 31, 2018</time> by Jungfaha**

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Jungfaha said:
> 
> 
> any way to get it to stop saying its not compatible on the load screen?
> 

Yep, you can edit file [x] Science!.version in the mod folder. You need to update this part (change patch to 2):

        "KSP_VERSION":
        {
            "MAJOR":1,
            "MINOR":4,
            "PATCH":1
        }
